original: intros. unfold ln. destruct (Rlt_dec 0 x) as [H1|H1], (Rlt_dec 0 y) as [H2|H2]. - rewrite ln_mult; auto. rewrite ln_Rinv; auto. field. - exfalso; apply H2, Rabs_pos_lt, H0. - exfalso; apply H1, Rabs_pos_lt, H. -
